title: Increase logo size for better visual harmony

requirements.summary: Increase the logo size in the header navigation to be larger and more visually harmonious with the overall layout
acceptanceCriteria: Logo appears noticeably larger in the header
Logo size is proportional and harmonious with other header elements
Logo maintains proper spacing and alignment in the header
Logo scales appropriately on mobile devices

file_operations.description: Increase the logo image size in the header navigation from its current dimensions to a larger, more prominent size that creates better visual harmony with surrounding elements. Adjust the containing link element's dimensions and spacing to accommodate the larger logo while maintaining proper alignment with navigation items. Ensure the logo scales appropriately on mobile viewports using responsive sizing classes. Preserve all existing authentication logic, menu structure, and the orange branding theme (#ea580c).
